arStrings.szText: Commune with the{icon:Marker_Brazier_Exterior, 2.6}{c_highlight}Spirit Brazier{/c} to open a portal to the{Icon:Marker_Undercity_Entrance, 2.2}{c_highlight}Kurast Undercity{/c}.
Commune with the{icon:Marker_Brazier_Exterior, 2.6}{c_highlight}Spirit Brazier{/c} to open a portal to the{Icon:Marker_Undercity_Entrance, 2.2}{c_highlight}Kurast Undercity{/c}.
Traverse the Undercity to reach its District Boss before time runs out. {c_highlight}Time expiration ends your run{/c}.
Traverse the Undercity to reach its District Boss before time runs out. {c_highlight}Time expiration ends your run{/c}.
Slay{icon:Marker_Undercity_Elite, 3.0}{c_highlight}Afflicted Monsters{/c} and destroy{icon:Marker_Undercity_Structure, 3.0}{c_highlight}Afflicted Structures{/c} to earn time extension bonuses.
Slay{icon:Marker_Undercity_Elite, 3.0}{c_highlight}Afflicted Monsters{/c} and destroy {icon:Marker_Undercity_Structure, 3.0}{c_highlight}Afflicted Structures{/c} to earn time extension bonuses.

Earn {icon:Undercity_Attunement_FontIcon, 3.0}{c_highlight}Attunement{/c} by slaying Monsters and igniting{icon:Marker_Spirit_Brazier, 2.6}{c_highlight}Spirit Beacons{/c} and{icon:Marker_Hold_Out, 2.6}{c_highlight}Grand Spirit Beacons{/c}.

Earn {icon:Undercity_Attunement_FontIcon, 3.0}{c_highlight}Attunement{/c} by slaying Monsters and igniting{icon:Marker_Spirit_Brazier, 2.6}{c_highlight}Spirit Beacons{/c} and{icon:Marker_Hold_Out, 2.6}{c_highlight}Spirit Grand Spirit Beacons{/c}.
Achieve {icon:Undercity_Attunement_FontIcon, 3.0}{c_highlight}Attunement Rank 1{/c} to earn powerful {c_highlight}Reward Upgrades{/c}. Higher Attunement Ranks further enhance completion rewards.
Achieve {icon:Undercity_Attunement_FontIcon, 3.0}{c_highlight}Attunement Rank 1{/c} to earn powerful {c_highlight}Reward Upgrades{/c}. Higher Attunement Ranks further enhance completion rewards.
